title: rito pls do the nerf to the slam jam man
body:
i was playing the slam jam man when i sawa filthy demsyin skrub who wasn't slammed. this could not happen for all demsyins will be slammde. so i went up to him to slam him like this:
http://s9.postimg.org/3r2j9qjov/Slam1.png

so then i used my spin move:
http://s13.postimg.org/c1zx8jdl3/Slam2.png

and then i used my slow move so he couldnt run away like the rest of teh filthy demasyin cow warts:
http://s21.postimg.org/fda6y0lfb/Slam3.png

and then i could finally SLAM JAM. but before i could use it he died from blood loss so i couldnt slam him:
http://s28.postimg.org/7d99iobvx/Slam4.png


ATENTION RITO GAME:

daryus is doing so much damage that he can't slam pls do the nerf so i can slam

Your beautiful art inspired me. 
http://i.imgur.com/MU1Rcz4.png

> [{quoted}](name=aliceandsven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pZpFETnl,comment-id=00040003,timestamp=2016-01-21T20:53:55.626+0000)
>
> There's nothing more annoying than these pointless threads getting Red posts that are equally pointless...
> 
> You do have a board for the meme and game shit

I think this was a clever way of saying "riot nerf darius" in a memorable and hilarious way that isn't just... complaining.  I for one appreciate the effort and thought it was great :D

It wasn't a clever way of saying anything, at no point in the game can a Darius kill a Garen with a single Q, a single W, and the two bleed stacks from aforementioned abilities.  The OP was clearly trying to make a cute "rito pls" comic in the vein of the old actually funny comics like "I'm wearing him as a hat," and the first Rioter to respond did so with an MS paint comic.  The dude you are responding to is right, there is a board for this and I really wish there was a way a Rioter could flag their posts as not game related so the red tracker doesn't pick up things like this.
People that "just complain" about a champion being too strong with actual numbers or even anecdotal evidence are better than a hyperbolic MS paint comic full of le cutesy misspelled words, by the way.

God forbid a riot employee innocently respond to a funny post. As of they're not allowed to respond to anything but serious business ever.

Quit taking things too literally. It was an amusing way of pointing out that Darius is too strong.

You sir take the Internet too seriously.

It was as cringy as you unironically saying "you sir."
Also stop saying Darius is too strong as if it was fact.
dont you think you have enough downvotes already?
It's okay, salt has been known to clog the humor sensors

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Colin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pZpFETnl,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-21T18:41:49.805+0000)

These young people today...
Slam jam? Only one champion has the right to use that phrase, and it ain't Darius.
YOU SPEAK LIES, THE DUNK MASTER CAN USE WHATEVER NAME HE PLEASES
Dunk, slam, slam jam. It is all the same. It comes in many words, but the meaning is the same

Report darius 5 hacking, his not using the manas
No, he just had a full scaling mana regen runepage

I feel like this just can't be ok; too much like trying to be the legend that was OrbitalDropKick:

http://imgur.com/gallery/Vy37Q

I've quite literally never seen that until now. Plus, that comic lacks Comic sans, Microsoft paint, and has proper grammar. And my comic has an important underlying message and deep character development
darius is a serious issue right now. An absolute must ban in solo q. If he gets fed in lane - which is almost impossible for him not too he can win the game solo.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------> Joke

-----------------------------------------> Your Head

But yeah I do agree. In solo Q not too many people know how to deal with Darius. 

#BanDunkman

I watch pro and diamond games all the time. Darius is always dominating top end play too. You can't "deal" with Darius. He is simply stronger than every other champion due to his passive and healing plus overloaded ult.
